name: BLACK WATER (itch) (fractalcherries, River Cairn)
description:
The world of BLACK WATER is waiting for you just below the ocean surface! Take a dive into the deep and come face-to-face with strange deep-sea creatures. 

The pictures you take will automatically be saved to your device. (This feature can be disabled in the in-game Settings.)

art, game design: fractalcherries

music: River Cairn
